author: EXM7777
text:
in 2026 you need to be creativitymaxxing...

AI is becoming so good at execution that the bottleneck isn't technical anymore

you need creative input

think about it:
> everyone has access to the same models
> everyone can write the same prompts
> everyone gets similar outputs

the only differentiator left is the ideas you put IN

if you input generic... you get generic
if you input something only YOU could think of... you get something nobody else can make

start working on:
- connecting weird concepts
- asking better questions
- bringing your specific experiences into prompts
- thinking in directions others won't

and the world will be yours...
